name: tension builder ⛓
description:
A link back to remembering ⛲️

This is a very important token of appreciation for collectors of my first ever NFT, published on hicetnunc.xyz — and an invitation to 8 new collectors. 

All my work is generated from code, in the max/msp environment. I make heavy use of the video synthesis library `vsynth` by Kevin Kripper, and time the period of all synthesis inputs to produce a perfect loop. This is the longest loop I have minted thus far.

+ 1080 x 1350 60s looping mp4 captured in real-time from a max8 patch
+ Source code can be hunted down at github.com/depatchedmode

~ @depatchedmode
